title: King of Gods - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Seinen   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Ability Steal   Appearance Changes   Archery   Arrogant Characters   Battle Competition   Beast Companions   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Dao Comprehension   Dragons   Eidetic Memory   Elemental Magic   Eye Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heterochromia   Hiding True Abilities   Inheritance   Late Romance   Lucky Protagonist   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Realms   Personality Changes   Pets   Polygamy   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Race Change   Reincarnation   Ruthless Protagonist   Soul Power   Spatial Manipulation   Sudden Strength Gain   Time Manipulation   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique   Wars   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Fast Food Restaurant   快餐店
description:
His will is tough and he is unwilling to be normal. However, his pathway was destined to be that way, being born in a small sect’s branch.

However, one day, his left eye merges with the eye of an Ancient God in an accident. From that moment on, he turns from a fish into a dragon.

He rises up like a star, walking the path of a legendary cultivator.

From being a tiny, small ant at the bottom of the world, he rises step by step, into a place full of powerful sects, strong ancient clans and countless geniuses.

This is an era of legends.>
